Class AddressProcessUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mbc.receiptprinter.process.address.AddressProcessUtil

  • public class AddressProcessUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Various helper methods used in the processing of Address records

    • Method Detail

      • addressAlreadyExists

        public static boolean addressAlreadyExists(Address addressToCheck,
                           java.util.List<Address> addresses)
        Checks to see if an Address already exists
        Parameters:
        addressToCheck - The Address to verify
        addresses - The List of Address records to scan for the addressToCheck
        Returns:
        true if the addressToCheck is found in the addresses List; false otherwise

      • addressContainsInvalidCharacters

        public static boolean addressContainsInvalidCharacters(Address addressToCheck)
        Checks to see if invalid characters [ "(", ")", or "," ] are in the addressToCheck. These characters are invalid as they are used in the display of addresses formatted for receipts
        Parameters:
        addressToCheck - The Address to verify
        Returns:
        true if the Address name, city or address1 contain the invalid characters; false otherwise

      • getAddressForReceipt

        public static java.lang.String getAddressForReceipt(Address addr)
        Formats an Address record for display in the Receipt page
        Parameters:
        addr - The Address to format
        Returns:
        An Address record formatted for display in the Receipt page

      • extractNameFromReceiptAddress

        public static java.lang.String extractNameFromReceiptAddress(java.lang.String receiptAddress)
        Extracts the Address name field from the supplied receipt address
        Parameters:
        receiptAddress - An Address formatted for display in the Receipt page
        Returns:
        The Address name field; otherwise null
